fears.summary: Job market concerns and economic anxiety dominated discussions, with workers expressing worry about layoffs.

frustrations.summary: Political frustrations peaked with the parliamentary motion discussion consuming most conversation threads.

goals.summary: Financial planning and CPF optimization remained popular topics among working professionals.

aspirations.summary: Hope for better political accountability and community support featured prominently.

insights.headline: Political frustrations dominate daily discourse as parliamentary proceedings draw widespread criticism
key_takeaways: Parliamentary motion on Pritam Singh seen as waste of resources by many
Job market anxiety persists amid economic uncertainty
CPF discussions show proactive financial planning mindset
opportunities: Content around financial literacy resonates well
risks: Political frustration may escalate before elections
